description:
Caiman tries to convince Nikaido to return to the Hole with him, but her contract with En binds her. After the fight, En launches a search for her.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Memories of School Days / Boy Meets Girl = Battle! / Pinky Swear
Omoide School Days / Boy Meets Girl = Battle! / Yubikiri Genman
